item.title: We have just purchased ground for family house
item.description: In the last year we were looking for new place for living. Today we just purchased it. The ground is located in Star√° Boleslav and quite close to city center. We also have some pictures how it may look like once finished. Friends: ehm... The opening party is not yet planed :-) ... Location http://mapy.cz/s/4KIH Plans Hope, you like it as we do!
